html.topup: 💳 Top up your balance. 👇 Choose one of the plans offered below. You'll be redirected to a crypto payment gateway to complete your order.
html.topup.plan: ❇️ Chosen plan: 💬 {{count}} tokens 💲 {{price}} USDT 💳 Continue to gateway?
html.topup.success: 🙏 Your payment of {{price}} USDT was received successfully. Received tokens: {{count}} Current balance: {{balance}} tokens
cb.topup.pay: Your payment was created. Please proceed to the gateway to make the transaction.
